Description: On I-85 at mile marker 15 in the County of Mecklenburg, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south exit ramp narrows.

Description: On Rt. 628 in the County of Southampton, in the vicinity of Berlin Dory Rd; Rt. 626E/W (Southampton County), motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
